storyInfo: The setting sun illuminates the halo on his head like a crown. She recalls her mother's words, including the word that she did not fully understand - 'martyr'.

attributes.content: I was treating this like a holiday in Laterano... Never thought something like this would happen.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Kjerag is a theocracy too, so why couldn't we have done this?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Laterano is much more influential. The Legati were all part of the Apostle's plan.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: We simply don't have that sort of foundation.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Influence, eh? It's only after leaving Kjerag that I learned how troublesome influence can be.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Pretty amazing how Enciodes managed to negotiate with our neighboring countries all on his own.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: The Saintess's influence is on the rise too. We have our own advantages.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: But do you really think what the Lateran Pope is talking about is possible?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I don't know.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: I can't imagine a world where all the nations are so tightly entwined with one another. It sounds like a dream, or maybe a nightmare.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: But no one can ignore the miracle that happened that day, or the Pope's speech.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Is Laterano really the blessed city?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: What do the Sankta think of all this, Ezell?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Huh? Well, er... it was stunning?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Figured as much. Apparently, that bell has not rung for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: So what will happen to Laterano now?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Perhaps not all that much, from what I know of the Laterans. Or maybe it's the same everywhere.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Turning points in history don't always seem so important at the time.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But we do perceive that change is happening, and we'll take up our own duties and responsibilities.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Well said, brother.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You can leave us here. We have a car on the way.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: No problem. Cardinal Velliv is at a hospital not far from here. I'll be reporting back to her directly.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Please give her our thanks.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: As long as you're satisfied. Those were her instructions.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Nothing gets past her, huh?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Say, can you take a photo of me and my husband?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: How is that?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You're a pretty good photographer.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: You're welcome.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Say, Fiammetta, do you feel like your steps are heavier than usual?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Where's this coming from?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You don't feel a weight on your shoulders, after what His Holiness said?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Get to the point.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Well, I'm thinking I'm due for a career change. I'm not really cut out for a job with too much responsibility.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And you seem like just the girl to take myâ€”
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: In your dreams.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Good afternoon.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Long time no see, Ezell.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's only been two weeks...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Are you on a mission?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: An errand on behalf of Cardinal Velliv. I was just about to report back to her.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: This is my final task in Laterano.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Not bad. Once you've seen the world, you'll realize how boring this place is.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There aren't as many great desserts out there, but... life is about more than just enjoyment, don't you think?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: So you're going to meet with Velliv? Where is she?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Stevonus Central Hospital.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Let's go together then. We're headed the same way.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Have you made up your mind?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Yes, I have.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I thought you'd need to mull it over a little longer.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I just felt that I can't be the only one standing still, while everyone else has already taken the next step.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Then I have nothing to add. I'm glad you accepted.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: It's wonderful to have someone like you join us, times being what they are.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I knew you'd be here, Velliv.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How did you...?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: We ran into Ezell.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: The emissaries from Kjerag have reached their destination.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Good work.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But don't leave just yet. I've got another task I could use your presence for.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: See you next week, Lemuen.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: See you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Have you decided to join the Seventh Tribunal, Lemuen?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Already on the job.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hm, it won't be easy over there, after this conference.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Don't you think we're a match made in heaven though?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I suppose.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You've all chosen your paths. It's about time for me to think about what I can do too.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Speaking of, I was just talking to Fiammetta about quitting my job as a Legata.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Too much trouble?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I mean, with the old man? I can already see the trouble waiting in the future.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But you're not getting away that easily, Mostima. You answer to me now.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Here's your first job: bring this letter to El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Can I say no?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Deliver it to her personally.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Unemployment is sounding more appealing by the second.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Quit it with the lame excuses.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And there's my old taskmaster.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You won't give up.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How can you be so sure?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Don't pretend that you don't need this job.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're looking for an answer, aren't you?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm not Andoain.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I didn't say you were.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: But you have a choice to make, about who you are.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And to find that answer... one must have journeyed far enough.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: So how does it feel to be seen right through, Mostima? Sounds like you don't even need a halo to.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: This is my own path, then. You shouldn't follow me, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You think the world revolves around you? We just happen to be taking the same road.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I have his gun.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If he still sees himself as Sankta, he'll be back for it.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Then he'll pay for what he did!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And you'll help me.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Fine...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: By the way, the Astray that were caught in the city have been set free.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Is that His Holiness's will?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: His mercy is none of my business.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I thought you might say something like that.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh, and you'll be dispatched to Rhodes Island under the agreement with the Notarial Hall, through the Fifth Tribunal.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Er, you mean the pharmaceutical company that Mostima and Lemuel work part-time at?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Where's this coming from?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Velliv wants to deepen our cooperation. You're as good as anyone for the role.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Plus, we have a good track record with them. You should be well-supported.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, I have some really good news for you!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You get to choose from one of three code names for your next mission!
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Do we really have to keep up this farce, now that you're our liaison?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: We only used a temporary name in the first place because there's no clear role for keeping tabs on her.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I've had enough of these monthly name changes!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Didn't you like Shimmering Vigil? What was it that you said... 'they've finally come up with a decent name'?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Shut up.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hey, nice flowers.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hate to break it to you, but the tradition of changing your title has become a rule unto itself. Just accept it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Here are your choices: Void Gourmet, Wasteland Pilot, or Dawn Destroyer.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...Dawn Destroyer.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Man, your tastes are so easy to guess.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I told you to shut up already!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: *exhales*...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You're awake?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Luck has really not been on my side lately.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What's wrong? Getting bedsores from too much lying down?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No, forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Huh? Ezell?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I wanted him to see what happens to those who come close to betraying Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Stop bullying the kid, Velliv.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Are you implying that I'm not young myself?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Sorry.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You're no longer a Legatus.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: If that's the price I must pay, then...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But you're still my subordinate.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: ...it's a heavy one.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You talk a big talk, Oren. Let's see what you learned in Victoria.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Does that mean you need me to do things my way?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Remember that question you asked? I can answer it now.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I have no interest in being a woman of integrity.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But I respect those who have worked hard to earn the title.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Well... I can't argue with that.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Was that intended for me as well?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Treasure the opportunity you've been given with Cecelia. Don't ever let me know what... influence she will have on Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You don't want her returning here?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: If I didn't, why would I waste time crafting an identity for her?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Other than, well, compassion. And the fact that she still has potential value that outweighs her risks.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Trust me, there's no harm in getting this sort of candid promise.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. I'm simply expressing Laterano's sincerity.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: If you two ever get tired of traveling, Laterano will be here.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Her doors will be open.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Come in.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Federico?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Cardinal Velliv, here are the past two years of records regarding the activities of the former Legatus, Oren Argiolas.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Thank you, Executor Federico.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Just in case.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: There is reason to believe that Executor Richele may be his accomplice. Should I summon him?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: No need. He'll only claim to have been tricked by an old classmate, now won't he, Oren?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Remind me never to pick a fight with you again.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'll let Richele be. For now.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But I would like to speak with him through you, when it's convenient. You don't have a problem with that, do you?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: N-No, not at all.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Then the two of them have been dealt with for the moment, Executor Federico.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hold on, Federico.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I've been thinking. It couldn't have been easy to deduce that it was Feoria who met with the Sarkaz, just from a few sentences in a journal.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Why were you so obsessed?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Who were you seeking?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: ...Arturia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Arturia... huh? Arturia?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: The wanted criminal?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: What exactly is your relationship with her?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: A distant relative.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hahahaha!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Seriously, man.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: If I could stand right now, I'd be dragging you to the nearest bar.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't have time.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: You do, because I happened to run into an infamous fugitive a few years back. By the name of Arturia.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Wait! Calm down, Velliv!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I wasn't looking for her! It was a coincidence!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Seriously, I like to think of myself as a veteran, but just thinking back on that experience sends a shiver down my spine.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Where did you see her?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Three years ago, in Leithanien.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Richele...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The paperwork is in order. She's now free to leave Laterano.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Thank you, Richele.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Just doing my job.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: You know where you're going, right?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well, we'll meet up with Federico and join a company by the name of Rhodes Island under a cooperation agreement. Apparently, it's more convenient this way, since we'll be spending a lot of time outside.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Good. I've already contacted them.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But you're still an executor of the Notarial Hall. Missions will be issued to you through Rhodes Island when it's inconvenient for you to return.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: That said, I have a hunch that your journey with her will go smoothly. You might find what you're looking for sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: And my hunches are usually right.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Er, thanks?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'll be going, then. Goodbye, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Bye-bye, Mister Richele.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ah-choo!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Yikes. I'm getting a hunch that something bad's gonna happen...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Richele is an eccentric one too.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hey, wait, how did he know that we're looking for something?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: What's wrong, Mister Ezell?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Nothing.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is there anything else you want to say before we go?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The girl lets go of the young Sankta's hand and walks to the center of the flower field.
(I'm leaving Laterano, Mamma.)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (But I'm not running away.)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (I'm gonna find PapÃ  on my own, and tell him what you said.)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (I wanna see the outside world for myself... I wanna see Kazdel.)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (I'm happy, Mamma. Now, just like before...)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (Please, watch over me.)
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Can I pick a white flower?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Sister

attributes.content: Thank you!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You want to take this flower?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Uh-huh.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Fresh flowers won't last long. I can press it for you.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Will you teach me? I wanna learn for myself.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Thanks, Mister Ezell.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm the one who should be thanking you.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Eh? Is that...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Patia, are you really coming with me?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I was thinking you could stay here.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Laterano doesn't have what I'm looking for.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: What is it, Patia?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Excuse me, that was out of line.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: But... did you just smile?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Not to say that you don't normallyâ€”it's just that, well, something seems different.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: For many years, I thought we walked alone in the wilderness. I was arrogant and immature.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Did you hear the old man's speech?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I heard the second half when it woke me up. It was being broadcast all over the city. Loudly.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Yvangelista, the Patron Saint of Sacrifice and Unity. Perhaps he will go even further than the ten who took that name before him.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What a grand, yet fragile vision.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But one upon which I offer my blessings.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What did you learn that day?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: It's not important, Patia. Not so important, anyway.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Even if there is no reward waiting at the end of the journey, the act of continuing onward is, in itself, carrying the torch. Therefore, I will continue onward.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: We do not trade for blessings, nor for pity. We walk the path that we believe in.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Because... it is the only way to live with dignity, is it not?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: We should depart, Guide, before the sun sets.
attributes.name: Rosella

attributes.content: Let us go, my brothers and sisters.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.text: The girl of mixed blood sees the leader take the first step.
The setting sun illuminates the halo on his head like a crown.
She recalls the stories of the Saints that her mother would tell her, and the word that her mother placed so much emphasis on.
She does not fully understand its meaning, or its symbolism. For some reason, though, it comes to mind when she sees that faraway figure.

attributes.content: What are you looking at, Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No, nothing.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: The sunset is beautiful.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.text: The girl looks about her, at the flowers, at the church, at the statue and the bell tower, so far away now.
She takes the young Sankta's hand, and the two of them begin to walk into the distance.
Her steps are slow, but she does not look back.
